content: *create a fun fresh scarf out of your favorite granny square use bright colors as shown for a fun addition to any outfit or use more muted tones for a more classic scarf look lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80413ad corrections applied nov 23 2008 skill level easy vanna s choice® article #860 14 colors 1 ball each *ed note yardage needed will be less if fewer colors are used good pattern to use up afghan project remnants * crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm gauge 1 granny square = 6 in 15 cm square special stitch popcorn scarf is made of 16 squares sewn together into a strip follow color sequence to work squares changing colors every round three different motifs are provided similar pattern 60563a not-your-average-granny scarf 1 uses 15 different colors 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/not-your-average-granny-scarf
